changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS CHECK_DATA_TO_FEED_VW cascade
changeSet.createView: SELECT FEED_ID FEED_ID, f2.NAME as FEED_NAME, check_feeds.CHECK_DATA_FEED_ID as KYLO_FEED_ID, f.NAME as KYLO_FEED_NAME FROM FEED_CHECK_DATA_FEEDS check_feeds INNER JOIN FEED f on f.ID = check_feeds.CHECK_DATA_FEED_ID INNER JOIN FEED f2 on f2.ID = check_feeds.FEED_ID WHERE f.FEED_TYPE = 'CHECK' UNION ALL SELECT ID FEED_ID,NAME,id, NAME KYLO_FEED_NAME from FEED WHERE FEED_TYPE = 'FEED' UNION ALL SELECT f.ID AS FEED_ID,f.name AS FEED_NAME, f.ID AS KYLO_FEED_ID, f.name AS KYLO_FEED_NAME FROM FEED f WHERE f.FEED_TYPE = 'CHECK'
